channel.title: Error connecting bug
channel.description:
here is how this happens:
First we play all for like 30 mins and after some seconds, half of the people Gets disconnected and half of the play stay in the server and plays like everything is normal but the others keep getting error connecting, the run.bat command prompt aint showing anything only the people who is trying to connect "Clienthandler Rejected blablabl" can someone help me fix this bug
